item.title: Mentioned by Calgary Herald
item.description:
Silence rules as maverick Tory seeks to lift muzzle
In the same stuffy committee room in the bowels of Parliament's Centre Block, a number of Warawa's supporters in caucus showed up, including Rob Anders of Alberta and Harold Albrecht of Ontario. The committee promptly went in camera after Warawa's statement. Whether the ... Maverick MP Mark Warawa appealed to his colleagues Wednesday to allow his motion condemning sex-selective abortions.
